title: Trains operating between Aâ€™pura and Omanthai temporarily halted
content: Trains operating between Anuradhapura and Omanthai will be halted for five months, Sri Lanka Railways announced.This part of the Northern Line is suspended for maintenance work on the railway track, the General Manager of Railways, Dhammika Jayasundara explained.The railway department expects to reduce the travel time between Anuradhapura and Omanthai by approximately 40 minutes through these renovations.
